titles.title: Marine Mammal Protection Amendment Act of 2011
A bill to amend the Marine Mammal Protection Act of 1972 to increase the maximum penalty for violating that Act.
Marine Mammal Protection Amendment Act of 2011

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary: Marine Mammal Protection Amendment Act of 2011 - Amends the Marine Mammal Protection Act of 1972 to increase the maximum penalty for knowingly violating the Act's prohibitions against the taking or importation of marine mammals.
